item.title: Ever wonder why cashew nuts are so expensive !!
item.description: Coding efficiency makes the DOM slower or faster. The DOM performance depends on how less you use the DOM..Regular browser dom is as fast as virtual dom

item.title: SKAM (Norway TV Series)
item.description: Skam (translate to “Shame” in English) is a Norwegian teen tv series.It represents everything from sexuality, love, religion, races, mental illness through their main characters.
item.author: rabby.mohiuddin@gmail.com (Golam Mohiuddin)

item.title: Prevent Distractions and Sharpen Your Focus
item.description: Distractions take attention away from what an operator needs to do when performing a task. Distractions can be external (such as noise) or internal (such as tiredness, rumination, or anxiety).
item.author: rabby.mohiuddin@gmail.com (Golam Mohiuddin)

item.title: Top reasons to use Canva and grow your Business
item.description: When your business enters the web-based media domain, you need the engagement of your targeted audience Creating simple and boring graphics won’t make much effect on your business, that’s for sure.
item.author: rabby.mohiuddin@gmail.com (Golam Mohiuddin)

item.title: Browser DOM is faster than Virtual DOM!!
item.description: Coding efficiency makes the DOM slower or faster. The DOM performance depends on how less you use the DOM..Regular browser dom is as fast as virtual dom

item.title: Growth Mindset - the new psychology of success
item.description: Our mindset is essential when teaching ourselves new skills. Our perspective will have more of an impact on our chances of success than just about anything else.
item.author: rabby.mohiuddin@gmail.com (Golam Mohiuddin)
